dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile Kunji, Mobile Academy, and Kilkari all use IVR technology that is already being used by the commercial mobile industry to make audio content available to any mobile phone across India. At the national level, both Mobile Academy and Kilkari have been integrated with the governmentâ€™s Maternal and Child Tracking System (MCTS).
Community member, Community health worker or volunteer, Community member

Sara Chamberlain, Director, Digital, BBC Media Action sara.chamberlain@in.bbcmediaaction.org Malika Malhotra, Project Director, National Scale-up, BBC Media Action malika.malhotra@in.bbcmediaaction.org

Mobile Kunji - Bihar, Odisha, Uttar Pradesh Mobile Academy - Bihar, Odisha, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand and Uttarakhand Kilkari - Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand and Uttarakhand

Client education and behavior change communication, Child health, Family Planning, Maternal health, Newborn heath, Nutrition/Food Security, Sexual and Reproductive Health, Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene
